app.name: Medinet
app.short_description: Send Zendesk Sell deal data to Medinet
app.long_description: This app reads the current Deal and its primary Contact in Zendesk Sell, validates required fields, and sends the payload to a backend endpoint for Medinet import.
app.installation_instructions: Install the app and configure the backend_base_url and backend_api_key parameters. Then open any Deal and click 'Subir a Medinet'.

backend_api_key.label: Backend API Key
backend_api_key.helpText: Must match the API_KEY environment variable configured on Render.
